title: A Survey on Large Language Models for Code Generation and Automated Coding

sections.description: Introduce the topic of large language models (LLMs) and their growing significance in code generation and automated coding. Discuss the motivation behind the survey, highlighting the rapid advancements and applications of LLMs in AI programming. Provide an overview of the paper's objectives and structure.

subsections.description: Discuss the reasons for conducting the survey, emphasizing the importance of LLMs in modern programming.
Outline the main goals of the survey, including what it aims to achieve in the field of code generation.
Provide an overview of the paper's structure, detailing the main sections and their focus.

sections.description: Provide a comprehensive background on large language models, including their development and evolution. Define key concepts such as code generation, code synthesis, AI programming, and automated coding.
